isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - AIR COMPRESSOR GOVERNOR (TYPE D-2) - MAINTENANCE

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE
svcproc.para: Every 100,000 miles (160,000 km), disassemble the governor, clean and inspect all parts and replace as necessary.
Every 25,000 miles (40,000 km), clean or replace governor filters. When cleaning, use a solvent known to have no detrimental effect on metal or rubber material.
